definition: dried meat/private teacher's remuneration/withered/variant of 修[xiu1]
to decorate/to embellish/to repair/to build/to write/to cultivate/to study/to take (a class)
member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker

sentences.english: In 1608, the partnership also took over the Blackfriars indoor theatre.
sentences.chinese: 1608年，黑衣修士剧院也被他们接管。

sentences.english: Eyes a bright, incredibly have force monk is having a competition?
sentences.chinese: 眼睛一亮，居然有武修士在比试？

sentences.english: Of course, Brother Wanda knew this.
sentences.chinese: 罔达修士当然是知道这个的。

sentences.english: The friar of our district is a typical English man.
sentences.chinese: 我们这个区的修士是个典型的英国人。

sentences.english: The effect lasts for the duration of the Prayer and for 5 rounds thereafter.
sentences.chinese: 影响从修士祈祷开始，并在祈祷结束之后持续五轮。

sentences.english: The Friars , daily celebrate the Eucharist at the Manger and at noon perform a procession around the Holy Places.
sentences.chinese: 修士们每天在马槽庆祝感恩祭而夜里在圣地游行。

sentences.english: The monks bake bread by themselves.
sentences.chinese: 面包是修士们自己烘烤的。

sentences.english: Brother who lives at our school along with about 8 other brothers.
sentences.chinese: 他同另外8个修士一道住在默乐高中的校园内。

sentences.english: I became a writer the way other people become monks or nuns.
sentences.chinese: 我成为作家正如其他人成为修士或尼姑。

sentences.english: Friar Laurence, the monk, had his basket with him.
sentences.chinese: 修道士劳伦斯修士带着他的篮子。

sentences.english: Who are the monks in Athos?
sentences.chinese: 阿陀斯的隐修士都是些什么样的人呢？

sentences.english: A man who went from being the Premier of China to being a Benedictine monk and priest.
sentences.chinese: 他从中国的总理变成了本笃会的修士和神父。

definition: elder/term of respect for a Buddhist monk
honored sir (a person of higher status or seniority, or a Buddhist monk)
Mahayana, the Great Vehicle/Buddhism based on the Mayahana sutras, as spread to Central Asia, China and beyond/also pr. [Da4 cheng2]
head of a clan/natural leader/person of prestige and authority in a domain/suzerain
time immemorial/origin of the universe/the world
